description:
Lewdle like Wordle but about rude words!

What is Lewdle game?

Lewdle continues to go toe-to-toe with The New York Times’ Wordle, still being one of the most popular ‘dle’ spin-offs since the start of this year. However, you’ve got to be incredibly filthy-minded to guess some of the daily puzzles, so don’t be ashamed if you need assistance with the latest word.

What does Lewdle mean?

LEWDLE means "Rude Daily Word Game." LEWDLE is a spin-off of the online word-puzzle game Wordle. The premise of LEWDLE is the same as Wordle.

Players have to guess the five-letter word of the day in six tries.
